query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHK,'' AS FLAG , A.PSPID, B.BSTNK, A.MAKE_MM ||'01' AS MAKE_MM, SAPHEE.GET_CURRENCY2(CAST(A.WAERK AS VARCHAR(15) ), CAST(A.NETWR AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) ) AS NETWR, A.WAERK, A.ERNAM, VALUE((SELECT ST.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ST.USERNUMB = A.ERNAM), '') AS ERNAMNM, A.ERDAT, A.AEUSN, A.AEDAT, (SELECT DPT1_N FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT001 AS ZH WHERE ZH.MANDT = A.MANDT AND SUBSTR(ZH.PSNO,2,7) = A.ERNAM) AS MR_DEPARTMENT,
(SELECT DEPT_N FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT001 AS ZH WHERE ZH.MANDT = A.MANDT AND SUBSTR(ZH.PSNO,2,7) = A.ERNAM) AS MR_TEAM ,A.MR_DPT1 ,'ªÁ¿¸∞Ë»π' AS PLAN ,A.TYPE ,A.ACTION -- ,D.CONTENT , substr(#MAKF_DTT#,1,6) as MAKF_DTT ,A.CON_CH ,A.NEXT_MM ,A.CONTENT ,'' AS NMON
FROM SAPHEE.ZSDTW004 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.ZZPJT_ID = C.POSID -- -- INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZSDTW005 AS D -- ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT -- AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID --
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MAKE_MM BETWEEN SUBSTR(#MAKF_DT#,1,6) AND SUBSTR(#MAKT_DT#,1,6)
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND B.VKBUR = #VKBUR#
AND B.VKGRP = #VKGRP#
AND SUBSTR( B.VKGRP,1,2) = #MR_DPT1#
